title: Magnetic

description.plain:
ILLIT sings about a heart that goes straight to the person they like on “Magnetic,” the title track of their debut mini-album, SUPER REAL ME.

A dance-hybrid, Pluggnb, and House track, “Magnetic” expresses the feeling of being attracted to the person you like, like it’s magnetic. Beautiful arpeggio synths and dynamic bass with a powerful rhythm make ILLIT’s lively vocals stand out even more on the song.

The music video contains quirky and lovely images of the members who are overly immersed in what they like. They receive secret messages and experience various events and accidents before reaching the person they are falling for.

embed_content: Read “Magnetic” by ILLIT (아일릿) on Genius

ILLIT sings about a heart that goes straight to the person they like on “Magnetic,” the title track of their debut mini-album, SUPER REAL ME.

A dance-hybrid, Pluggnb, and House track, “Magnetic” expresses the feeling of being attracted to the person you like, like it’s magnetic. Beautiful arpeggio synths and dynamic bass with a powerful rhythm make ILLIT’s lively vocals stand out even more on the song.

The music video contains quirky and lovely images of the members who are overly immersed in what they like. They receive secret messages and experience various events and accidents before reaching the person they are falling for.
